entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
